wildrift.name: The Wildrift
wildrift.description: A rugged no-man’s land crawling with wild beasts and old ruins. Once fertile, now overrun, the Wildrift tempts adventurers with hidden loot and danger alike.

character.name: Han
character.backstory:
Once a warrior, now a wanderer, the monk walks the world seeking balance for every blow he once struck. He carries a single ember from his fallen temple — a flame he swore will never die until his heart truly finds peace.
GitHub: @the-real-han
Created via OpenQuests UI

3.message:
Welcome, Han the Monk, to The Timberkeep.
Let's conquer the world together!

worldLog.summary: The dawn broke over a silent land, marked by but a single soul's presence. The world stirred, as it always does, yet no great portents or challenges arose upon this first turning of the sun. A day passed, quiet and unburdened by conflict or grand pronouncements.

pinewood-grove.summary: The Timberkeep clan experienced a significant surge in their wood resources, gaining fifteen units. This notable increase marks the primary event in Pinewood Grove for day one.

goldforge-mine.summary: The Emberwatch clan experienced a significant surge in their gold reserves, with an increase of fifteen units. This discovery marks the most important event for the Goldforge Mine on this day.

harmony-fields.summary: No significant events occurred at Harmony Fields on Day 1.

golden-plains.summary: On this first day in the Golden Plains, a surge of 15 units of food appeared. The Sunherd clan experienced this bounty.

twilight-pits.summary: On Day 1 in the Twilight Pits, the Shardveil clan experienced a surge of 15 units of wood. No other significant events occurred at this location.

wildrift.summary: Day 1 in The Wildrift was uneventful. No clans were defeated or conquered, and there were no resource gains to report.

timberkeep.name: The Timberkeep
timberkeep.description: Timberkeep’s people dwell in forest clearings surrounded by towering pines. They’re builders and wardens—steady as the trunks that shield their homes.

emberwatch.name: The Emberwatch
emberwatch.description: The miners and smiths of Emberwatch live among glowing forges and dusty tunnels rich with gold. They trade sweat for fortune and see progress in every swing of their hammers.

prismveil.name: The Prismveil
prismveil.description: A gathering of traders and travelers who value balance over greed. Prismveil’s lands hold a little of everything—trees, farms, and gold for trade or craft.

sunherd.name: The Sunherd
sunherd.description: Peaceful and hearty, the Sunherd clan tends vast grazing fields where flocks roam freely. Food means life to them, and their bounty feeds all who stand beside them.

shardveil.name: The Shardveil
shardveil.description: A clan of wanderers drawn to fortune and mystery. Each sunrise brings them a different bounty—some days gold, others wood or food. Chaos is their ally.
